ask_name: May I have your name, please?
ride_ask_destination: Alright, where do you want to go?
ride_ask_departure: OK, and where are you departing from?
ride_ask_confirm_booking: I found a {service_provider:s} ride for you from {departure_location:s} to {arrival_location:s} for {price:d} credits that could pick you up in {minutes_till_pickup:d} minutes. Should I book that for you?
ride_bye: Thank you and enjoy your ride!
ride_confirm_booking: Right, your {service_provider:s} ride is all booked for you now!
ride_provide_driver_details: OK, you will soon be picked up in a {car_model:s} with license plate '{license_plate:s}'. Your booking id is '{booking_id:d}'.
ride_inform_search_criteria: I can also filter for service provider, driver name, and the carâ€™s model.
